item.title: This startup’s AI platform could replace 90% of your accounting tasks—here’s how

item.title: How Microsoft’s next-gen BitNet architecture is turbocharging LLM efficiency
item.description: A smart combination of quantization and sparsity allows BitNet LLMs to become even faster and more compute/memory efficient

item.title: You can now run the most powerful open source AI models locally on Mac M4 computers, thanks to Exo Labs
item.description: To further support adoption of local AI solutions, Exo Labs is preparing to launch a free benchmarking website next week.

item.title: AMD will lay off nearly 1,000, or 4% of staff, as AI competition heats up
item.description: AMD said today it will lay off 4% of its global staff, or perhaps somewhat less than 1,000 of its estimated 26,000-person workforce.
